reviewText: I can see why this show was dropped. They had a great show with wonderful stories. Than they added too many new people and ruined it.

love.

DECIDED TO BUY COMPLETE 5TH SEASON OF EIGHT IS ENOUGH TV SHOW FROM 1980'S BECAUSE IT WAS ON SPECIAL. REALLY ENJOYED THIS FAMILY TV SHOW FROM 1980'S. BEST OF ALL NO COMMERCIALS. GOOD QUALITY PLAYBACK.
  WOULD CONSIDER BUYING 3 MORE SEASONS OF THIS TV SHOW IF PRICE WAS MORE REASONABLE WITH FREE SHIP.
 REALLY LIKED LITTLE NICHOLAS BRADFORD IN THIS SHOW.
i waited along time for this series to come out on dvd....so happy it did, brings back a lot of memories
Great show! I would recommend you buying it!
great
I rated this cause I love the show but have a question - I read somewhere the 1987 family reunion movie is on this set as an extra. Is that true? Would anyone who knows be able to let me know?
A great show, even in it's last series. A nice look back to the early 1980s. Great actors, great stories, even 37 years later.
MY WIFE JUST LOVES THEM ALL.... THANKS.....

What can you say about a classic?  Getting to watch the ups and downs of the Bradford family once again is a treat.  Additionally, the quality is 100% great.  If you already have seasons 1-4 don't hesitate in getting season 5; you won't regret it.
Love the series
excellent quality!

I absolutely love this show and I'm super glad that I have Season 5 because there are some gold nuggets here. (The birth of Susan's daughter comes to mind).  However, I think by Season 5, Eight is Enough was beginning to lose it's magic.  The kids were getting too old and the stories didn't hold my interest as much.  I'm glad they cancelled it when they did.  I think a 6th Season would have been too much.
love this series watched it when i was younger.
Watched and enjoyed.  I'm glad the whole season  was in one set.  I hated the volume sets of seasons 2,3 & 4.
Eight is Enough is just the best.  I am so glad to own all 5 seasons
